controls.title: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for logical access to information and system resources in accordance with applicable access control policies

implementation.description: Configure EFS file system policies, resource-based policies, and POSIX permissions to restrict access based on IAM roles, users, and access points with specific path restrictions

controls.title: Least Privilege
controls.description: Employ the principle of least privilege, allowing only authorized accesses for users (or processes acting on behalf of users) that are necessary to accomplish assigned organizational tasks

implementation.description: Grant minimal required EFS permissions through IAM policies and file system access points with specific path restrictions

controls.title: Transmission Confidentiality and Integrity
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality and integrity of transmitted information

implementation.description: Enable encryption in transit for EFS mount targets using TLS and configure EFS utils with encryption parameters

controls.title: Protection of Information at Rest
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality and integrity of information at rest

implementation.description: Enable EFS encryption at rest using AWS KMS keys and configure appropriate key policies for access control

controls.title: Event Logging
controls.description: Identify the types of events that the system is capable of logging in support of the audit function

implementation.description: Enable CloudTrail logging for EFS API calls and configure VPC Flow Logs for network traffic monitoring

controls.title: Audit Record Review, Analysis, and Reporting
controls.description: Review and analyze system audit records for indications of inappropriate or unusual activity and the potential impact of the inappropriate or unusual activity

implementation.description: Configure CloudWatch alarms and AWS Config rules to monitor EFS access patterns and configuration changes

controls.title: Boundary Protection
controls.description: Monitor and control communications at the external interfaces to the system and at key internal interfaces within the system

implementation.description: Configure VPC security groups and NACLs to restrict EFS mount target access to authorized subnets and ports

controls.title: System Backup
controls.description: Conduct backups of user-level information contained in the system

implementation.description: Enable EFS automatic backups using AWS Backup service and configure backup retention policies

controls.title: Identity and Access Management Policy and Procedures
controls.description: Policies and procedures shall be established, and supporting business processes and technical measures implemented, for identity and access management systems, applications and infrastructure network and systems components.

implementation.description: Establish and document EFS access management procedures including role-based access controls and regular access reviews

controls.title: Data Security and Information Lifecycle Management
controls.description: Policies and procedures shall be established, and supporting business processes and technical measures implemented, for maintaining a complete data lifecycle management and data security controls.

implementation.description: Implement data classification policies for EFS stored data and establish lifecycle management procedures

controls.title: Encryption and Key Management
controls.description: Policies and procedures shall be established, and supporting business processes and technical measures implemented, to protect data through appropriate encryption or other cryptographic means.

implementation.description: Implement AWS KMS key management for EFS encryption with proper key rotation and access policies

controls.title: Infrastructure and Virtualization Security
controls.description: Policies and procedures shall be established, and supporting business processes and technical measures implemented, for infrastructure and virtualization security baseline configuration and monitoring.

implementation.description: Configure EFS mount targets within secure VPC subnets with appropriate network segmentation

controls.title: Business Continuity Management and Operational Resilience
controls.description: Policies and procedures shall be established, and supporting business processes and technical measures implemented, for business continuity and operational resilience planning.

implementation.description: Establish business continuity plans that include EFS backup and recovery procedures across multiple AZs

controls.title: Audit Logging / Intrusion Detection
controls.description: Policies and procedures shall be established, and supporting business processes and technical measures implemented, to ensure suitable audit logs are generated, maintained, and reviewed.

implementation.description: Configure comprehensive logging for EFS access through CloudTrail and implement monitoring for suspicious activities

controls.title: Amazon EFS should be configured to encrypt file data at rest using AWS KMS
controls.description: This control checks whether Amazon EFS file systems are configured to encrypt file data using AWS KMS.

implementation.description: Enable encryption at rest during EFS creation using AWS KMS keys

controls.title: Amazon EFS volumes should be in backup plans
controls.description: This control checks whether Amazon EFS file systems are added to backup plans in AWS Backup.

implementation.description: Create AWS Backup plans that include EFS file systems and configure appropriate backup schedules

controls.title: EFS access points should enforce a user identity
controls.description: This control checks whether Amazon EFS access points are configured to enforce a POSIX user identity.

implementation.description: Configure EFS access points with CreationInfo to enforce specific POSIX user and group identities

controls.title: EFS access points should enforce a root directory
controls.description: This control checks whether Amazon EFS access points are configured to enforce a root directory.

implementation.description: Configure EFS access points with RootDirectory to restrict access to specific file system paths

controls.title: EFS file systems should encrypt data at rest
controls.description: Checks whether Amazon EFS file systems are encrypted at rest

implementation.description: Enable encryption at rest for EFS file systems using AWS managed or customer managed KMS keys

controls.title: EFS file systems should be in a backup plan
controls.description: Checks whether EFS file systems are added to AWS Backup plans

implementation.description: Include EFS file systems in AWS Backup plans with appropriate backup frequency and retention

controls.title: EFS access points should enforce a user identity
controls.description: Checks whether EFS access points are configured to enforce a user identity

implementation.description: Configure EFS access points with POSIX user information to enforce specific user identities

controls.title: EFS access points should enforce a root directory
controls.description: Checks whether EFS access points enforce a root directory

implementation.description: Configure EFS access points with root directory settings to limit file system access scope

cost.name: AWS EFS Cost Optimization Best Practices

controls.title: Implement EFS Intelligent Tiering
controls.description: Enable Intelligent Tiering to automatically move files to lower-cost storage classes

implementation.description: Configure EFS lifecycle policies to automatically transition files to Infrequent Access (IA) storage class based on access patterns

controls.title: Use Provisioned Throughput Only When Necessary
controls.description: Avoid provisioned throughput mode unless burst throughput is insufficient

implementation.description: Monitor EFS performance metrics and only enable provisioned throughput when burst mode limits are consistently exceeded

controls.title: Monitor and Optimize EFS Usage
controls.description: Regularly monitor EFS usage patterns and optimize storage allocation

implementation.description: Use CloudWatch metrics to track EFS usage, identify unused files, and implement data cleanup policies

controls.title: Right-size EFS Performance Mode
controls.description: Choose appropriate performance mode based on actual requirements

implementation.description: Use General Purpose mode for most workloads and only use Max I/O mode when higher IOPS are required

controls.title: Implement Data Lifecycle Management
controls.description: Establish policies for data retention and deletion to minimize storage costs

implementation.description: Create automated processes to identify and remove obsolete data from EFS file systems

controls.title: Use Regional Storage Classes Appropriately
controls.description: Choose between Standard and One Zone storage classes based on availability requirements

implementation.description: Use EFS One Zone storage class for workloads that don't require multi-AZ resilience to reduce costs

controls.title: Optimize Mount Target Configuration
controls.description: Configure mount targets efficiently to minimize network costs

implementation.description: Place mount targets in the same AZ as compute resources to minimize cross-AZ data transfer charges
